headline: Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL): Among Defensive Stocks Billionaire Ken Fisher is Betting On
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Defensive Stocks Billionaire Ken Fisher is Betting On. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) stands against other defensive stocks billionaire Ken Fisher is betting on. Ken Fisher, an American billionaire investor, author, and financial analyst, founded and runs Fisher Asset Management. […]
